knxUltimateHueButton.switch_info: Link the KNX group address triggered by short presses.
knxUltimateHueButton.dim_info: Configure the KNX dimming GA that handles repeat events during long presses.
knxUltimateHueButton.behaviour_info: Select whether events toggle values automatically or send fixed payloads.
knxUltimateHueButton.toggle_values_hint: Enable to alternate true/false and dim up/down; disable to send fixed payloads defined below.
knxUltimateHueButton.output_info: No KNX gateway selected. Events are still emitted on the Node-RED output pin.
